name: World of Warriors PvP
description:
WORLD OF WARRIORS

═══════════════════════════════════                                                      Battle online against friends or random real-life players in a game of wits! Unlock new characters to explore various strategies! ════════════════════════════════════ Features: ★ Mobile and tablet compatible! You can see attack info on mobile by "dragging" your thumb over the buttons without releasing it! ★ There is an option to fight AI if it takes too long to find another player. ════════════════════════════════════ Credits: ★ HP bars are based on code from @HyperCode. ★ Other battle displays use code from @djpro. ★ The music is from Fire Emblem: New Mystery of the Emblem by Yuka Tsujiyoko. ★ The sprites and the background while in battle are from "Superpowers RPG Battle System Asset Pack" by Pixel-boy.
